description.value:
A Planar Focus is imbued with the power of the plane it is created on, and can be used to compel and command outsiders.

This Planar Focus is the material component for the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-spells.Item.qd6husWa910b2sn4]{Planar Binding} spell, typically valued at 1000 gold. It maintains the spell on a successful casting, and cannot be used again while the spell lasts.
